scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:WikiPagesManagement_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($pagesListId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('pagesListId'))
$core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('paged-pages.vm')
#registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.wikiPagesManagement') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="AddPage">Add Page</resource> <resource name="cancel">Cancel</resource> <resource name="ConfirmDelete">Are you sure you want to delete this page?</resource> <resource name="Default">Default</resource> <resource name="Delete">Delete</resource> <resource name="Edit">Edit</resource> <resource name="find">Find a page...</resource> <resource name="Hidden">Hidden from TOC</resource> <resource name="Lock">Lock</resource> <resource name="Locked">Locked</resource> <resource name="more">More</resource> <resource name="no_pages">No matching pages have been found in '{0}' yet.</resource> <resource name="NoResults">No results.</resource> <resource name="NotPublished">Not Published</resource> <resource name="PageDeleted">Page has been deleted.</resource> <resource name="Publish">Publish</resource> <resource name="Published">Published</resource> <resource name="showall">All</resource> <resource name="showhidden">Hidden from TOC</resource> <resource name="showonlydeleted">Unpublished</resource> <resource name="Unlock">Unlock</resource> <resource name="Unlocked">Unlocked</resource> <resource name="Unpublish">Unpublish</resource> <resource name="View">View</resource> <resource name="WikiPagesManagement_Description">Manage Wiki pages.</resource> <resource name="WikiPagesManagement_Name">Pages</resource> </language>
